plugins.name: Bind Viewer
plugins.author: blacku + frap129
plugins.description: Universal keyboard shortcuts keymap that automatically detects and displays keybindings for Hyprland or Niri compositors.

plugins.name: Clipper
plugins.author: blackbartblues
plugins.description: Advanced clipboard manager with history, search, keyboard navigation, ToDo integration, pinned items, notecards/sticky notes, and selection-to-notecard feature. Fully translated with comprehensive i18n support.
